htmlbody:
Preparing a write-up of this case will require knowledge of Portuguese (PBcensus 1 - complete raw data). Although there are no existing case studies in English on Alagoinhas, the city was surveyed in the Participatory Budgeting Census 2012 (Spada et al.). Thus, many of the fixed data fields provided by Participedia are complete. (The fixed data fields can be accessed and edited by logging onto this site and selecting the “edit” tab above the title of the case. Please see the "help" section on "contributing content" for additional guidance.)

The PB process in Alagoinhas was initiated in 2001 and appears to be ongoing in 2015. The link below to the dissertation in Portuguese has enough description to generate a full case for the period 2001-2004. Primary research is needed to cover the other years.

Note

We are uploading three type of cases using the information contained in the Participatory Budgeting Census 2012 that are tagged for easier retrieval in the following way:

PBcensus 1 - complete raw data

PBcensus 2 - requires phone call

PBcensus 3 - requires significant research

External Links

http://www.spadap.com/data-collection-projects/the-brazilian-participato... [Participatory Budgeting Census 2012]

https://www.google.com.br/maps/place/Alagoinhas+-+BA/@-12.1343997,-38.4263338,13z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m2!3m1!1s0x716bc4664f79dcd:0xa2750b2cba29fb80

https://pt.wikipedia.org/wiki/Alagoinhas

http://www.alagoinhas.ba.gov.br/index.php?link=visualiza_noticia&id_noti... [webpage of the PB process in Portoguese]

http://bdtd.ufs.br/tde_busca/arquivo.php?codArquivo=132 [Dissertation on the PB process in the city in Portoguese]
title: Participatory Budgeting in Alagoinhas
